data.name: Loplight
data.detailed_description:
You are Edda, a young girl lost in a dying world.
The elements of the world have been unleashed, ancient demons stalk the lands.
Collect the pieces of Quintessence, ascend to a divine power, defeat the elder god
harvesting the souls of the world.



  • Short but replayable story
  • High intensity combat, Dodge, Slash, and Shoot your way to victory!
  • Story Rich experience, explore the morality behind ambition and loneliness

data.short_description: Loplight is a twin-stick shooter taking inspirations from Hermetic lore and old alchemical concepts. Explore the ruins of this world, find out who's responsible, and defeat the monstrous creatures blocking your path.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features several enemy and friendly non-player characters that show their bare breasts. There is also a fair bit of blood and gore at certain key moments of the game.
